article_title: Health insurance survey: More employers dropping spousal coverage
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: Thirty-one percent of employers surveyed did not cover spouses who have health insurance available through their own jobs in 2014, up from 20 percent in 2012.
og.title: Health insurance survey: More employers dropping spousal coverage

twitter.title: Health insurance survey: More employers dropping spousal coverage

article_metadata.description: Thirty-one percent of employers surveyed did not cover spouses who have health insurance available through their own jobs in 2014, up from 20 percent in 2012.
